model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Neighbors A: I just visited this amazing new city. The architecture was stunning, the streets were so clean, and the people were very friendly.

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Neighbors B has moved around a lot over the years but is now considering settling down in the current place. Neighbors B has been meaning to start practicing gratitude and wants to incorporate positivity into their routine by counting blessings, not problems. Neighbors B enjoys living in the neighborhood and feels at home where they live.

Relationship Description:
Neighbors A and Neighbors B have been neighbors for years and Neighbors B thinks Neighbors A is friendly and outgoing. Neighbors A appreciates Neighbors B as a neighbor and is excited to see where Neighbors A's new journey takes.

Event Description:
Neighbors A and Neighbors B had a block party last summer and Neighbors A is planning to organize another block party soon. Neighbors A moved to a new neighborhood and has started to feel more at home. Neighbors A found a park nearby and a cute little coffee shop, and is excited to explore the area. Neighbors A hopes to make new friends soon and appreciates Neighbors B as a neighbor.
